titleStmt.title: A plain and impartial enquiry into gospel-truth as stated and vindicated by Mr. Dan. Williams, especially in reference to the doctrine of justification, and the nature of his proceedings, with his testimonies thereupon / by Thomas Edwards.
titleStmt.author: Edwards, Thomas, fl. 1693-1699.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect : pages cropped and faded with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
